title: Wind Cave National Park: Donate
body: Donations       Thank you for your interest in supporting Wind Cave National Park.  Your donation will enhance the programs and activities to protect park resources and provide visitor services for Wind Cave National Park.  Philanthropic contributions continue to make a significant difference and we welcome and are grateful for your support.  There are several ways of supporting Wind Cave National Park. The park is able to accept direct donations.  If you are interested in donating directly to the park you may contact the Superintendent by phone at 605-745-4600 or by email.  Donations may be sent to:  Superintendent, Wind Cave National Park, 26611 U.S. Highway 385, Hot Springs, SD  57747.
